questions.text: In the opening shot, what is Henry taking off the clothes line in his tent?
questions.explanation:
women's clothes.

	There have been many times when he has had to take women's clothes off of the line in his tent.  I could see Klinger doing this, but not Henry, afterall, he is a married man.

questions.text: Who ordered the evaluation to be done on the 4077th?
questions.explanation:
Gen. Clayton

	He wondered if they might be cracking up being so close to the front.  Also he had received a report or two from Hot Lips and Frank telling them of what unmilitary like conduct went on there at the 4077th.

questions.text: After the shrink comes, Henry wants to have a meeting with Hawkeye and Trapper.  Where does this meeting take place?
questions.explanation:
shower.

	Henry thought that the showers would be the best place to have it.  He even turned the water on so that if by chance someone was listening, they would not be able to hear what they were saying.

questions.text: What was the name of the shrink that came to sneakily check out the 4077th in season two?
questions.explanation:
Dr. Hildibrand

	He kept sneeking around taking notes on everything.

questions.text: When Frank arrived at the 4077th, what did Hawkeye say his boxer shorts said?
questions.explanation:
hold me.

	Hawkeye said that he "arrived with shorts that said 'hold me' and a bible in one hand".

questions.text: In this show Klinger is wearing a hat.  The hat is kind of like what a golfer would have worn back in the 30's.  What color is the hat?
questions.explanation:
red and blue.

	The hat is kind of strange.  It is a knit and it has a little ball on the top of it.

questions.text: Whose nails were being filed by Hawkeye?
questions.explanation:
the skeleton's.

	He was sitting in Henry's office acting like he was doing that.  Strange but true.

questions.text: Frank found something in his boot.  What did he find?
questions.explanation:
a body part.

	He said "Oh you guys!"

questions.text: What was the point of the shrink being there at the 4077th?
options: decide if Henry was doing a good job
copy them because they had a 98% survival rate
Get them ready to move closer to the front
questions.explanation:
break them up.

	In this show it was to break them up.  There was another show where they sent someone to spy on them, but it was so that they could see what it was that made them so good.

questions.text: What was the shrink doing when the person who sent him came?
questions.explanation:
drinking.

	He was drinking and most likely drunk.  He told him that the worst thing that could be done would be to break up the 4077th.
